question: 1. i would like to know that which surah is that in which no bismillah is read at the begining and 2. question is that which sursh is that in which there r two bismillah read
answer:
QUESTION

1. i would like to know that which surah is that in which no bismillah is read at the begining and
2. question is that which sursh is that in which there r two bismillah read

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

1. Surah Taubah.

2.  Complete Bismillāh is only mentioned twice in Surah Al-namal, one in the beginning of Surah and the second in āyyah #30.[1] In Surah Hūd the word Bismillāh appears in āyyah #41,[2] but not as a complete Bismillāh.

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum

 

Ml. Abduz Zaman,
Student Dārul Iftā

Checked and Approved by:
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā

 1 اِنَّهُ مِنْ سُلَيْمَانَ وَإِنَّهُ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ (سورة النمل،آية:30)

2 وَقَالَ ارْكَبُوا فِيهَا بِسْمِ اللَّهِ مَجْرهَا وَمُرْسَاهَا إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ(سورة هود،،آية:41)
